AotY2011 RETCON UPDATE!

2019-04-04

Originally I had a different album of the year for 2011, which was Balls Out by Steel Panther. While I still get the SP joke, it is wearing thin over the years, and looking back I feel more and more embarrassed by that choice. The irony has burned a hole through which I can now see the woke.
